General.Name: Rongsheng Paper
General.Description: Zhejiang Rongsheng Environmental Protection Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd. produces and sells recycled paper products in China. It offers packaging products, such as kraft cardboard paper, corrugated base paper, and corrugated cardboard. The company produces steam. In addition, it provides kraft containerboard products. The company exports its products. Zhejiang Rongsheng Environmental Protection Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Pinghu, China.
General.Address: No.588 Zhennan East Road, Pinghu, China, 314213
